item.description:
For those interested in going tonight and want to park on Storrow Drive, they open at 4 pm! We will have a meetup sign for our group and will set up an area facing the stage to the right as close to the front as possible! There are booths set up with free food and other stuff right near the esplanade from 4 till around 6. It really is a lot of fun!

The Beach Boys
item.how_to_find_us: We will have a meet-up sign and will reserve a spot to the right of the stage
item.name: Oldies 103.3 Free concert on the Esplanade- The Beach Boys
